Q&A Data.Subject: AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION
Q&A Data.Question: What is AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION and what does it do?
Q&A Data.Answer: AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION is a plugin for multilingual translation of ComfyUI. It implements the translation of the resident menu bar, search bar, right-click context menu, and nodes.

Q&A Data.Subject: AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION
Q&A Data.Question: What languages does AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION support for the menu?
Q&A Data.Answer: The plugin currently supports Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), English, Japanese, Korean, and is looking for help to support more languages such as French, German, Japanese, and Korean.

Q&A Data.Subject: AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION
Q&A Data.Question: How can I help with translating AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION into other languages?
Q&A Data.Answer: If you are a native speaker of a language other than English and Chinese, you can contribute to the translation effort by opening a new 'Language Name' folder in the plugin directory, adding the language code in the LocaleMap.js file, and restarting the ComfyUI service.

Q&A Data.Subject: AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION
Q&A Data.Question: How can I install the AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION plugin?
Q&A Data.Answer: To install the AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION plugin, you need to clone the repository to the custom_nodes folder in ComfyUI and run the git clone command in the ComfyUI/custom_nodes directory.

Q&A Data.Subject: AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION
Q&A Data.Question: How do I use the AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION plugin?
Q&A Data.Answer: To use the AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION plugin, you need to launch ComfyUI, open the menu, and click on the language option to switch languages.

Q&A Data.Subject: AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION
Q&A Data.Question: What are the limitations of the AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION plugin?
Q&A Data.Answer: The plugin currently has two limitations. The first is that direct switching of any language node to the target language will lose custom names. The second is that a small portion of options that use Enum type data cannot be translated.
